title: Insect Life Cycle
description: Insect Life Cycle introduces readers to different types of insects. It then gives the details of two different types of life cycles and describes the separate stages: egg, larva, pupa, nymph, and adult. Photographs with captions support the text.
meta: adult, cocoons, egg, larva, life cycle, metamorphosis, nymph, pupa
Use the reading strategy of asking and answering questions
Sequence Events : Identify the sequence of events in the book
Commas : Recognize and use commas in a series

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
